python:
from event_manager import *
from machine import Pin, SoftI2C
from aiot_dht20 import DHT20
from yolobit import *
button_a.on_pressed = None
button_b.on_pressed = None
button_a.on_pressed_ab = button_b.on_pressed_ab = -1
from aiot_lcd1602 import LCD1602
from mqtt import *
from machine import RTC
import ntptime
import time

event_manager.reset()

aiot_dht20 = DHT20(SoftI2C(scl=Pin(22), sda=Pin(21)))

aiot_lcd1602 = LCD1602()

def on_event_timer_callback_T_U_a_j_H():
  global th_C3_B4ng_tin, Th_E1_BB_9Di_Gian, RT, GDD, RH, LUX, SM, serial_RT, serial_RH, serial_LUX, serial_SM, serial_GDD, serial_data
  aiot_dht20.read_dht20()
  RT = aiot_dht20.dht20_temperature()
  RH = aiot_dht20.dht20_humidity()
  SM = translate((pin1.read_analog()), 0, 4096, 0, 100)
  LUX = pin2.read_analog()
  if LUX >= 2000:
    GDD = (GDD if isinstance(GDD, (int, float)) else 0) + 1
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('RT:')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(3, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(RT)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(7, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('*C')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(10, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('RH:')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(13, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(RH)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(15, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('%')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('LUX')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(4, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('      ')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(4, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(LUX)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(10, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('SM:')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(13, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(SM)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(15, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('%')
  serial_RT = ''.join([str(x) for x in ['!1:001:', RT, '#']])
  serial_LUX = ''.join([str(x2) for x2 in ['!1:002:', LUX, '#']])
  serial_RH = ''.join([str(x3) for x3 in ['!1:003:', RH, '#']])
  serial_SM = ''.join([str(x4) for x4 in ['!1:004:', SM, '#']])
  serial_GDD = ''.join([str(x5) for x5 in ['!1:005:', GDD, '#']])
  serial_data = ''.join([str(x6) for x6 in [serial_RT, serial_LUX, serial_RH, serial_SM, serial_GDD]])
  print(serial_data, end =' ')

event_manager.add_timer_event(15000, on_event_timer_callback_T_U_a_j_H)

if True:
  display.scroll('Test')
  mqtt.connect_wifi('', '')
  display.scroll('OK')
  ntptime.settime()
  (year, month, mday, week_of_year, hour, minute, second, milisecond) = RTC().datetime()
  RTC().init((year, month, mday, week_of_year, hour+7, minute, second, milisecond))
  aiot_lcd1602.clear()
  GDD = 0

while True:
  event_manager.run()
  time.sleep_ms(1000)
name: IoT_farm

extensions.name: AIOT Kit
extensions.description: Mục mở rộng dành cho bộ kit AIoT

extensions.name: SỰ KIỆN
extensions.description: Mục mở rộng hỗ trợ sử dụng sự kiện trong chương trình

extensions.name: MQTT
extensions.description: Mục mở rộng hỗ trợ giao tiếp MQTT cho ứng dụng IoT

extensions.name: NTP
extensions.description: Mục mở rộng hỗ trợ đọc thời gian từ Internet qua giao thức NTP (Network Time Protocol)
